item.description: <p>Thanks Matt, this is just what I was looking for (trying to figure out how to save an excel file without the '.xsp" extention) !</p>

item.title: By: Jens Polster

item.description: <p>The same technique can of course also be used in LotusScript. See my post about <a href="http://www.domblog.de/domblog.nsf/d6plinks/vcards-from-lotusscript" rel="nofollow ugc">dynamically created vCard downloads</a> for sample code.</p>
